decisions.name: Does_this_hold_a_winter_wear_alert
decisions.label: Does this hold a winter wear alert

rules.name: Over_Threshold
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND (7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11) AND 12 AND 13
rules.label: Over Threshold

rules.name: Needs_Inventory_Alert
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9) AND (10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15)
rules.label: Needs Inventory Alert

Flow.description: V8: After Send to Production Schedule V10: added shiptype updates V12 added screens to change products to short sleeve V13: Added Fedex and UPS V14:added HTV V15:added Engraving V19: Changed all updates to assignments added logic for FD recognition

formulas.name: IsMinimumLevel
formulas.expression: IF( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL ({!Loop_to_get_single_record.Product2.SKUID_SKU__c} , "202"), {!Loop_to_get_single_record.Min_Overall_Stock_Level__c} = 216), AND( ISPICKVAL ({!Loop_to_get_single_record.Product2.SKUID_SKU__c} , "235"), {!Loop_to_get_single_record.Min_Overall_Stock_Level__c} = 432), AND( ISPICKVAL ({!Loop_to_get_single_record.Product2.SKUID_SKU__c} , "291"), {!Loop_to_get_single_record.Min_Overall_Stock_Level__c} = 288), AND( ISPICKVAL ({!Loop_to_get_single_record.Product2.SKUID_SKU__c} , "320"), {!Loop_to_get_single_record.Min_Overall_Stock_Level__c} = 48), AND( ISPICKVAL ({!Loop_to_get_single_record.Product2.SKUID_SKU__c} , "340"), {!Loop_to_get_single_record.Min_Overall_Stock_Level__c} = 48), AND( ISPICKVAL ({!Loop_to_get_single_record.Product2.SKUID_SKU__c} , "6001"), {!Loop_to_get_single_record.Min_Overall_Stock_Level__c} = 48), AND( ISPICKVAL ({!Loop_to_get_single_record.Product2.SKUID_SKU__c} , "9001"), {!Loop_to_get_single_record.Min_Overall_Stock_Level__c} = 48) ) ,TRUE,FALSE )

Flow.label: Product Names to Opportunity

textTemplates.name: Email_INV_Alert_Body
textTemplates.text:
A sku in order {!$Record.Name} is greater than 80% of its inventory level.


{!Product_Overage_List}

textTemplates.name: StickerAlertBody
textTemplates.text:
Hey! There is a sticker order that has over 1,000 pieces.


Order: {!$Record.Name}

textTemplates.name: Winter_Wear_Alert_Body
textTemplates.text: A winter wear sku in order {!$Record.Name} is greater than 1/2 of warehouse 1 inventory level.
